meanings.definition: In an egoistic manner; with excessive self-interest.
meanings.sent1: She always acted egoistically, thinking only of herself.
meanings.sent2: He spoke egoistically, bragging about his achievements.
meanings.sent3: The cat ate all the treats egoistically, not sharing with the other pets.
meanings.sent4: The politician campaigned egoistically, focusing solely on his own agenda.
meanings.sent5: The child played egoistically, refusing to take turns with the toys.

meanings.definition: Acting in a self-centered or selfish way.
meanings.sent1: Her egoistically behavior made it hard for others to be around her.
meanings.sent2: The egoistically student only cared about their own grades.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel hoarded nuts egoistically, not leaving any for its friends.
meanings.sent4: The CEO made egoistically decisions, prioritizing profit over employee well-being.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted egoistically, ignoring feedback and suggestions.
